welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Clarkston, the charming and welcoming city known for its rich history and diverse culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at College Park Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at College Park Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering luxurious amenities and personalized services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton County Airport houses all check-in counters, security checkpoints, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Fulton County Airport offers exclusive services for private jet passengers, including luxury lounges and VIP concierge services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The north terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves primarily international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The south terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gwinnett County Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Gwinnett County Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atlanta Speedway Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Atlanta Speedway Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
